our recordings and rehearsals.

We had a shorter rehearsal period than usual for this live performance.
We had a very short rehearsal period.

It's time for Ami Tanimoto and Marin Fukuda to say goodbye to Apkami!
We've seen a lot of different videos this time, too.
I, Fukuda, was very impressed by the vocal recording of Shiori Yagi and Rio Sakurai.
I was reminded once again that the difficulty of each Hello Project song is very different from each other.
I was also impressed by the way the two singers were sincerely working on the songs.
I felt the difficulty and hardship of the recording process again today.
I felt once again that I would like to be as earnest and focused as the two of them when I try to record in the future.
And I, Tanimoto, am taking a makeup class with Rei Inoue of JuiceJuice.
I've never had a chance to see my idol wearing makeup so closely.

I thought it was really wonderful to be able to see so many different makeup styles like this.
